topComments.author: Rashid Ahmed
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este deve ser um lugar imperd√≠vel se voc√™ estiver procurando por uma excurs√£o de um dia com a fam√≠lia ou amigos perto de Nova York. Para um dia quente de ver√£o, o parque aqu√°tico oferece a oportunidade de relaxar. Os passeios s√£o divertidos, mas h√° uma longa fila para entrar em um e sinto que isso realmente mata a maior parte do seu tempo. Eu realmente amei a piscina em movimento ao redor do parque. Voc√™ pode simplesmente entrar em um tubo e relaxar.  Eu sugiro levar um protetor de respingos para o seu telefone se voc√™ quiser capturar os grandes momentos em torno do parque aqu√°tico. Eles geralmente cobram mais caro se voc√™ comprar o protetor do parque. √â melhor encomend√°-lo na Amazon antes de visitar o local  (Original) This should be one of the must visit place if you are trying to look for a family or friends day outing near New York. For a hot summer day the water park really gives you an opportunity to chill down. The rides are fun but there‚Äôs a long line to get in to one and I feel that really kills most of your time. I really loved the moving pool all around the park. You can just get on a tube and let yourself go and relax.  I would suggest to take a splash protector for your phone if you want to capture the great moments around the water park. They usually over charge if you buy the protector from the park. It‚Äôs better to order it from Amazon before visiting the place

topComments.author: Shrikar Swami
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu amo este lugar, √© muito divertido e os passeios aqu√°ticos s√£o √≥timos e eu adoro ir neles. Se voc√™ tiver uma chance, definitivamente deveria visitar o parque. Ele tem muitas coisas para fazer quando se trata de uma divertida piscina de ondas, tobo√°guas gigantescos e meu favorito pessoal, o rio lento. A experi√™ncia √© √≥tima e vir com os amigos tamb√©m √© √≥timo. A equipe √© √≥tima e garante que voc√™ esteja seguro o tempo todo. Os passeios s√£o emocionantes e muito divertidos. Existem alguns lugares para comer, mas honestamente eles n√£o s√£o √≥timos, mas se voc√™ tiver uma chance, definitivamente merece uma visita  (Original) I love this place, it is so much fun and the water rides are great and I love to go in them. If you ever have a chance you should definitely visit the park It has a lot of stuff to do when it comes to a fun wave pool, humongous slides and my personal favorite the lazy river. The experience is great and coming with friends is also great. The staff are great and make sure you're safe at all times. The rides are thrilling and are so much fun. There are a few food places but honestly they aren't great, but if you have a chance it definitely deserves a visit

topComments.author: Stile liege
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O parque em si √© √≥timo, embora tr√™s das maiores atra√ß√µes estivessem fechadas, incluindo o rio lento. A comida era exorbitante e mesmo com o plano de alimenta√ß√£o dos s√≥cios algo ainda precisava ser pago.  A √°rea das crian√ßas pequenas estava fechada, ent√£o fomos para a √°rea das crian√ßas maiores e as crian√ßas estavam descontroladas, os pais n√£o estavam prestando aten√ß√£o nas crian√ßas e minha filha de 3 anos acabou levando um chute no olho.  No geral, o bom supera o ruim e n√≥s nos divertimos, mas definitivamente h√° coisas que precisam ser mudadas no parque. E as pessoas e os salva-vidas precisam prestar muito mais aten√ß√£o √†s crian√ßas antes que algu√©m se machuque seriamente.  (Original) The park itself is great though three of the bigger attractions were closed including the lazy river. The food was exorbitantly expensive and even with the meal plan for the membership something still have to be paid for.  The little kids area was closed so we went to the bigger kids area and the kids there were uncontrolled the parents weren't paying attention to the kids and my 3-year-old daughter ended up getting kicked in the eye.  Overall the good outweigh the bad and we had a fun time but there's definitely things that need to be changed in the park. And people and lifeguards need to pay way more attention to the kids before someone gets seriously injured.

topComments.author: Josue Silva
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Servi√ßos personalizados ruins e muitas atra√ß√µes foram fechadas e a comida era muito cara com uma variedade pobre. Muitos dos escorregas estavam fechados, fazendo com que as filas nos poucos dispon√≠veis fossem muito longas, embora n√£o houvesse muita gente no parque, a comida era p√©ssima, com pouca variedade e muito cara.  (Original) Poor custom services and a lot of attractions was closed and the food was very expensive with a poor variety. Muchos de los toboganes estaban cerrado, haciendo que las filas en los poco que hab√≠an disponibles fueran muy larga aunque no hab√≠a muchas personas en el parque, la comida muy mala con poca variedad y muy costosa.

topComments.author: Cheryl Sosa
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Pior dia de abertura de 2022! A maioria dos passeios estavam fechados e parecia ser devido a n√£o ter funcion√°rios suficientes, pois um passeio fechava e outro que estava fechado abria. Isso causou filas muito longas, ~ 1 hora de espera. As piscinas estavam lotadas por causa dos passeios limitados e eles at√© paravam as ondas √† tarde. T√£o decepcionante. Os funcion√°rios tamb√©m n√£o tinham no√ß√£o do b√°sico do parque, n√£o sabiam quest√µes b√°sicas como onde se acham perdidos e achados. Tamb√©m houve problemas com o resgate do vale-refei√ß√£o, com mais longas filas devido ao fato de os gerentes n√£o conhecerem seu sistema. Decidiu sair e seguir para uma grande aventura. As esperas n√£o eram t√£o longas e a maioria (talvez todas) passeios estavam abertos e sem problemas com refei√ß√µes ou funcion√°rios. Por que 5 estrelas? Mais pessoas v√£o ver isso.  (Original) Worst opening day 2022! Most of the rides were closed and it seemed to be due to not having enough employees as one ride would close and another that was closed would open. This caused really long lines, ~1 hour waits. The pools were packed because of the limited rides and they even stopped the waves in the afternoon. So disappointing. Employees also had no idea of the park basics, did not know basic questions like where's lost and found. There was also issues with redeeming dining pass, with more long lines due to managers not knowing their system. Decided to leave and head over to great adventure instead. Waits weren't as long and most(maybe all) rides were open and no issues with dining or employees. Why 5 stars? More people will view this.

topComments.author: Princess Aquino
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Comprei a ades√£o e passes para a temporada na semana passada, e foi em um s√°bado. Fui l√° cedo para evitar multid√µes e tivemos um grande momento. Saiu por volta das 3 da tarde, quando as pessoas come√ßaram a aglomerar-se na √°rea. Ir√° novamente esta semana. As crian√ßas se divertiram muito, a comida estava √≥tima at√© agora, a √°rea em que ficamos tinha √°gua limpa, os salva-vidas tamb√©m estavam presentes.  (Original) Bought membership and season passes last week, and went on a saturday. Went there early to avoid crowds and we had a great time. Left by 3pm when people started crowding the area. Will go again this week. Kids had a lot of fun, food was great so far, the area we stayed on had clean water, life guards were present too.

topComments.author: Renee Longstreet
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) As crian√ßas sempre se divertem. Bela maneira de passar o tempo. S√≥ gostaria que eles n√£o tivessem acabado com o passe de comida. O custo da comida √© muito alto e, na melhor das hip√≥teses, nem sempre √© t√£o bom, ent√£o se voc√™ estiver se divertindo ao sol, √© √≥timo, mas n√£o tente alimentar uma fam√≠lia ou grupo.  (Original) Kids always have fun. Nice way to pass the time. Only wish they would not have  done away with the food pass . The cost of the food is way too high and at best  not always so good so if you're going for fun in the sun it's great but don't try to feed a family or group .
